title: Hoover Dam
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 1,889 words, Level Z1 (Grade 5+), Lexile 1220L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     M and V
description: Hoover Dam stands as one of the greatest engineering feats in the United States. It helped transform the American Southwest, allowing water from the Colorado Riverto be used throughout the desert landscape. Students will enjoy learning about how the dam was built and how it operates.
